name: AI Assistant
description: Voice-activated AI assistant for car navigation
changelog:
v1.0.0
- Voice-activated AI assistant for car infotainment
- Hands-free voice commands: Open apps, control music, navigation
- Online AI chat for smart responses
- Custom wake word support
- Floating assistant icon for quick access
- Offline voice recognition

name: Offline TTS Engine
description: High-quality offline text-to-speech engine with 904 voice options. Works as a TTS plugin for AI Assistant.
changelog:
v1.0.0
- Sherpa-ONNX based offline TTS engine
- 904 different voice options
- No internet required
- Integrates with AI Assistant settings
- High-quality English voice synthesis
